page.title: 15PASTIMES
page.content: My name is Alaric Walmsley and I am a white belt at judo. On Thursday evening at four o'clock my mother cooks my dinner.Then at four thirty I get my judo suit ready and I start walking down the lane.I wait for Mrs.Kierman to take me to judo in Brampton.At half past five Duncan Findlay and Alan Findlay come and teach me different moves and loads of other throws. Judo is a martial art.We sometimes jump on a trampoline for exercise purposes.At quarter to seven we tidy up and go swimming.Alan Findlay is the life guard.I have got my beginners and my intermediate certificates for swimming from school.
